Package com.android.slackandhay.scene

This package contains all classes of our OpenGL rendering engine

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GLBufferLibrary handles all the vbo texture ids and offsets TODO allocate only once vertice and index buffers too
GLCameraSceneNode Camera class represents the camera for a specific scene graph
GLMeshNode Specific Scene Node - represents a plane which holds a texture, which an be changed at runtime
GLNullSceneNode Ein Knoten, der selbst nichts rendert und nur zu organisatorischen Zwecken verwendet wird
GLRootSceneNode Root Scene Node represents Scene Graph and is supposed to hold all scene nodes for a specific scene; renders camera
GLSceneNode Scene Node represents a Graphic Object
GLSurfaceView Render Thread and Renderer
GLTexture Container Class for holding runtime needed variables of textures
GLTextureLoader Texture Loader Class Basically loads Textures
 

Enum Summary
Animation Animation enum - represents the order of images for specific animations - for communication purpose between game and render thread
Texture Texture Enum for valid Texturenames Purpose: Communication between Game Thread and Render Thread
 

Package com.android.slackandhay.scene Description

This package contains all classes of our OpenGL rendering engine
